prefixLength.description: Prefix length of the IP range represented by the record. Note: this is not the same as `subnet.prefixLength`.

primary.description: Boolean indicating if this is the primary IP of the assigned equipment

reverseLookup.description: Reverse lookup set for the IP. This only applies to IPv4. For IPv6 see [GET /ips/{ip}/reverseLookup](#operation/get/ips/{ip}/reverseLookup).

nullRouted.description: Boolean to indicate if the IP is null-routed

unnullingAllowed.description: Boolean indicating if the null route can be removed

equipmentId.description: ID of the equipment using the IP

subnet.title: subnet
subnet.description: Object containing information about the network and gateway

id.description: Subnet identifier consisting of network IP and prefix length separated by underscore (e.g. 192.0.2.0_24)

gateway.description: The gateway IP to be used in network settings
